page.title: 13RETIREMENT IN GILLING WEST
page.content: {Oswin Grove}was built twenty one years ago. It was built to provide living accommodation for{elderly people}from Gilling and surrounding farms and villages .There is one large building containing twenty-seven flats. Four of the flats are for couples and the rest are for one person. There are also eight semi-detached bungalows to house couples who can manage for themselves. Inside the buildings there are some special{'intercoms'}through which the old people can talk to or summon help from the{warden. The Richmond branch of the W.R.V.S provide a{'meals on wheels'}service twice a week. This is a popular area for people to move to on{retirement,} hence there is a large proportion of {senior {citizens}in the village.
